```{r Load package, include=FALSE}
require('parkrun')
library('dplyr')
```

```{R benchmarking}
course <- 'riverside'
events <- 300:333

results <- bind_rows(lapply(events, function (event) GetResults(course, event)))
athleteRuns <- table(results$athleteNumber)
repeatRunners <- names(athleteRuns [athleteRuns > 15])

attach(results)
lm(I(5000 / timeInSeconds) ~ athleteNumber * runSeqNumber, data=results[results$athleteNumber %in% repeatRunners, ])


```
